description:
Shiryu and Shun arrive to help Seiya, but Cassios stands in their way. Pretending to be their enemy, Cassios attacks Shun and Shiryu and knocks them down. Cassios then proceeds to the house of Leo to face Aioria himself. Cassios knows that in order for ArIes`s evil spell over Aioria to be broken, Aioria must kill one enemy,and due to his love and devotion for his mentor Shina, Cassios wants that enemy to be him. Aioria toys with Seiya andpunishes him with cruelty, bringing him near to death, but Cassios shows up and saves the day. After sacrificing himself to save Seiya and spare Shina the pain if Seiya were to die, Cassios reveals that he has always loved Shina deeply. Once Cassios is dead, Aioria snaps out of his spell, and all is well again in the land of Saint Seiya. But now they must move on to the next house with only 7 hours left to save Saori. Can they do it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Otoko Da! Cassios Ai ni Shisu
What a Man! Cassios Dies For Love
